page.title: 14Trueloves
page.content: Trueloves is a branch of the Shaftesbury Society which offers sheltered accommodation for slightly mentally handicapped young adults. The hostel is in a large Victorian house set in several acres of land. At the moment they can offer 12 places for adults whose handicaps do not allow them to live without help. The residents have large shared bedrooms; rooms for TV,records,games, hobbies and social occasions and a pool for supervised swimming. During the day the residents are guided by the staff to keep their rooms and clothes tidy and help with preparing the meals. They also attend a local adult training centre or work in and around the hostel. When we were shown around, Mrs. Hopcraft was very helpful and we could feel the very caring atmosphere.
